bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Electrical Control for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis
IEEE Standard Requirements for Electrical Control for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Standard requirements for all types of electrical control circuits for ac high-voltage breakers rated above 1000 V are given. This standard is applicable for any type of power-operated mechanism and for both ac and dc control power. Only basic control elements of the circuit breaker, including reclosing where required, are included in this standard. Devices or circuits for protective relaying, special interlocking, etc., are not included.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.11-2014 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.11-1997)
IEEE Std C37.11-2014 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.11-1997)
